snippet: Wall Street seemed to welcome strong moves by the Bank of Japan and assurances by the Fed of continued stimulus in the United States.
abstract: Stocks rise as Bank of Japan announces aggressive policies to lift economy, but weak jobs data in US caps gains.
lead_paragraph: Wall Street seemed to welcome strong moves by the Bank of Japan and assurances by the Fed of continued stimulus in the United States.

headline.seo: Central Banks’ Muscle Keeps Markets Climbing
headline.main: Central Banks’ Muscle Leads to Modest Gains in Markets
headline.print_headline: With Pep Talks Coming From Central Banks, the Markets Make Modest Gains
